WRITING.TITLE: Hello
WRITING.TEXT: So I was recently diagnosed with MDD, so I decided I might as well check this place out, Idk really what to say in this post, so I #8217;ll just say some stuff about myself, my name is Quinn, I #8217;m thirteen, I #8217;ve had bad mental health issues for maybe 8 months now, I struggle with self harm, I think I have social anxiety, I think I may have ptsd as well, and that #8217;s all I can think of for now, my heads all over the place right now, and I can #8217;t think straight, hope y #8217;all are doing well, thanks for reading
Thanks, you have a good day as well
Well I hope you feel better soon, you #8217;re not a failure, good luck

WRITING.TITLE: Feeling like a different person
WRITING.TEXT: Hi, so I #8217;ve had this feeling that I #8217;m a whole different person, just with the same memory #8217;s and stuff, not really sure why I feel like this, it just feels like I #8217;m someone else, does anyone else feel like this? any thoughts on this?
Yeah, I #8217;ll talk to my psychiatrist about it next appointment, thanks for responding

WRITING.TITLE: Hi, I guess I just want someone to talk to
WRITING.TEXT: School #8217;s way too much for me, I wish I could just stay in bed forever, and have my family forget about me, I #8217;ve got a self harm problem, and I wish no one cared about me, I keep getting mad at my mom for trying to help me, and I #8217;m thinking of ending it.
Idk, everything #8217;s just too much, and I #8217;m hurting too many people, I #8217;m the worst, but thank you

I don #8217;t know, all I ever do is take breaks, I #8217;m behind on school, I never talk to anyone irl, I never wanna get out of bed, I just don #8217;t see the point in taking a break, I don #8217;t think it would get better if I did, it #8217;d just keep getting worse like always, and I #8217;m the worst cuz I #8217;m too impulsive, good for nothing, and all I ever do is hurt the people who care about me, I wish no one would care about me

I #8217;m dwelling on many specific events, when I say hurting people, I mean I #8217;m hurting them emotionally because of my horrible mental state, and doing things like self harm and shit, and I guess I could try doing some nice things for them, but I feel like doing mean things to them, maybe they wouldn #8217;t care about me anymore if I did, idk I #8217;ll try it, thanks

Sounds like depression, but I #8217;m not a professional, so not 100% sure, also, yeah I totally feel ya, being addicted to feeling bad, I always get mad mad at myself whenever I #8217;m feeling even a little happy, and I tend to do pretty much anything I can to make myself feel horrible again, I remember one morning a while ago, I didn #8217;t feel quite as depressed as normal when I woke up, and I did everything in my power to make myself feel bad again, but nothing was working, I started panicking, eventually I got myself to feel horrible again, I don #8217;t know why I want to feel horrible, I just do

The thing is, I don #8217;t really want everything to be perfect, I #8217;m addicted to feeling horrible, and I don #8217;t want to feel better, I don #8217;t want anyone to care about me, because then I #8217;m making my problems their problems, when I #8217;m the only one that should have to deal with them
Mm, idk maybe, I #8217;m kinda doubtful, but I guess I could try, thanks

Yeah, honestly I have no clue who I am, every time I think I do, I always realize later that that isn #8217;t who I am at all, I keep having these weird half-blackouts, and after they happen it feels like I #8217;m a different person, just with the same memories and stuff, I should probably talk to my psychiatrist about that

WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;m so so so confused right now
WRITING.TEXT: There #8217;s something going on with my head but I have no idea what, well actually I have a few ideas of what I may be, but I really don #8217;t know, I was recently diagnosed with depression, but there #8217;s something else going on with me, I go through periods of being absolutely sure that it #8217;s one thing, and then realising that that was not at all what it was, then again, I guess it could be one of the things that I #8217;ve thought I proved wrong, I had a couple periods of this with thinking I had depression, then thinking it definitely wasn #8217;t, but then I was diagnosed with it, so I don #8217;t know, I #8217;m just way too confused right now
I #8217;ve got an appointment with my psychiatrist later today, I hope he can help figure out what #8217;s going on, thanks

Yeah, I #8217;m staying home from school today, I don #8217;t think I can deal with it today, I #8217;m doing some work from home, starting with just some reading to help calm me down, Thanks for the advice
Yes, that would be quite pleasant, thanks
